title: Client crashing my computer
body: I've attempted to download league of legends a minimum of 10 times in the past week having it stop at 9%, 12%, and 27%. Ultimately freezing my computer and crashing it. Disabling firewalls didn't do anything.

replies.body: Your computer freezing like this sounds pretty serious, like hardware failure.  As a first step, double check your vents and make sure they are clear for air flow.  If the issue persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help figure out what's going on.
